posts.post_title: Fourteen Lower Grade T206 Cards For Sale
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Cy
Hi,

I have fourteen lower grade T206 cards for sale (Schmidt, Oldring, O'Leary, McQuillan, Powers, Barry, Devlin, Ames, Ganzel, Hahn, Hinchman, Killian, Davis, O'Neil). Each card has its problems but the price is right. I need $162 for the group, which includes shipping. There are two scarcer backs, Old Mill and Polar Bear.

[IMG]http://www.cyscards.com/t206afb.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.cyscards.com/t206arb.jpg[/IMG]

If you would like to buy them, you can contact me at:

Thanks.

Cy
